<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Magnetite Scope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1213)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 181</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to firearm (scope)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

More of a field projector than a scope, this small cylinder of magnetite has been enchanted to spread and accelerate the shrapnel of a [scatter](/Traits.aspx?ID=413) weapon further than the weapon's natural capabilities. Furthermore, some of the floating magnetite inside the scope's structure can help you when attempting to determine the your allies' locations. The magnetite scope grants you a +2 item bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) when using the scope to assist you in navigating. This scope can only be attached to firearms with the scatter trait.
